Text.Page: Damned argons! There's too many of them. I can't fight through on my own.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What's your objective?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Three soldiers under my command died yesterday, and I want to recover their dog tags for their families.

Jared, Genevieve, and Misha deserved better, but I won't let their names be lost to the winds.

But it's all I can do to hold this position. I can't fight my way through to their bodies. Think you can recover them for me?
(Misha's tags are cut in half, but still readable.)
(You find Jared's dog tags, but something else catches your eye.)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What's this?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I tried to keep the argons busy. Hope you didn't get too banged up.

Thanks for recovering these. It means a lot to me.
